message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $18000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down to $15000 to make this deal work. This reflects the value of the product and still gives you a good price.  Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $15000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13500?
